Uses of Interface
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.TypeAdapter

  • Packages that use TypeAdapter 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm
    Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest
    Provides the classes necessary for RESTful object-relational mapping.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful ORM framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite
    Provides the classes necessary for SQLite object-relational mapping.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.

    • Uses of TypeAdapter in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm

      Methods in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm that return TypeAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract <T> TypeAdapter<T> ObjectMapper.resolveType(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Retrieves the TypeAdapter registered for the given Class.
      Methods in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm that return types with arguments of type TypeAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,? extends TypeAdapter<?>> Session.getRegisteredTypeAdapters()
      Returns a Map containing all TypeAdapter instances registered with this Session and the Class instances in which they are registered for.
      abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,? extends TypeAdapter<?>> ObjectMapper.getRegisteredTypeAdapters()
      Returns a Map containing all TypeAdapter instances registered with this ObjectMapper and the Class instances in which they are registered for.
      Methods in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm with parameters of type TypeAdapter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Session Session.registerTypeAdapter(java.lang.Class<T> type, TypeAdapter<T> adapter)
      Registers the given TypeAdapter for the specified Class with this Session instance.
      abstract <T> void ObjectMapper.registerTypeAdapter(java.lang.Class<T> type, TypeAdapter<T> adapter)
      Registers the given TypeAdapter for the specified Class with this SqliteMapper instance.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RestfulJsonTypeAdapter<T>
      Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to JSON.
      class  RestfulPairsTypeAdapter<T>
      Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to RESTful web service name-value pair fields.
      class  RestfulXmlTypeAdapter<T>
      Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to XML.
